description._content: [Wyver [i.e. Hofvijver], Hague, Holland] [between ca. 1890 and ca. 1900]. 1 photomechanical print : photochrom, color. Notes: Photo shows the Binnenhof across the Hofvijver (Court Pond), The Hague, Netherlands. (Source: Flickr Commons project and Wikipedia, 2009) Title from the Detroit Publishing Co., catalogue J, foreign section. Detroit, Mich. : Detroit Publishing Company, c1905. Print no. "6142". Forms part of: Views of architecture and other sites in the Netherlands in the Photochrom print collection. Subjects: Netherlands--Hague. Format: Photochrom prints--Color--1890-1900. Rights Info: No known restrictions on reproduction. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA Part Of: Views of architecture and other sites in the Netherlands (DLC) 2001697995 More information about the Photochrom Print Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.pgz Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsc.05811 Call Number: LOT 13423, no. 052 [item]

note._content: This used to be my grandfather's office.
